bella.title: BELLA
bella.description: The perfect combination of elegance, comfort and style: Bella Armchair Set. With Neva Furniture's unique design and quality craftsmanship, it adds an aesthetic touch to your living spaces.
bella.material: Our own production, the Bella Armchair Set attracts attention with its modern lines while offering a soft and comfortable seating experience with its velvet textured fabric. Its back-supported ergonomic structure combines both aesthetics and comfort to provide enjoyable seating experiences.
bella.comfort: With its wooden leg details and elegant stitching, this set is designed to add a warm and sophisticated atmosphere to your living rooms with its timeless style.
bella.accessories: Color coordinated armchair and decorative pillows
bella.production: As Neva Furniture, we meticulously produce all our products in our own facilities, offering you long-lasting and stylish solutions.

boss.title: BOSS
boss.description: The choice of those who want to add elegance and charisma to modern living spaces: BOSS Armchair Set. This set, a unique design by Neva Furniture, offers a sophisticated look with its elegant stitching details and wood-paneled side panels. Its structure, which can adapt to both classic and contemporary decoration styles, will change the atmosphere of your home.
boss.material: With its soft textured upholstery fabric, comfortable seating areas, and back-supported cushions, it offers an ideal space to relieve the fatigue of the day. Moreover, thanks to its large interior volume, you can host your guests in the best way.
boss.company: The BOSS Armchair Set is waiting to take its place in your home with Neva Furniture's production assurance and aesthetic understanding. Take your style one step further now!

brahma.title: BRAHMA
brahma.description: Where simple elegance meets warm textures: BRAHMA Armchair Set. This special set, brought to life with Neva Furniture's elegant design approach, brings a peaceful atmosphere to your living space with its natural tones and modern lines.
brahma.material: With its wide seating areas prioritizing comfort, soft back cushions, and quality upholstery, it offers both aesthetics and functionality together. The wooden leg and frame details complete durability with elegance. The harmonious combination of different color tones makes BRAHMA a model that perfectly fits both classic and contemporary styles.
brahma.production: Domestic production with Neva Furniture assurance
brahma.company: BRAHMA Armchair Set will be indispensable for those who want a simple yet impressive decoration. Now is the time to make a difference in your home!

casa.title: CASA
casa.description: Where naturalness meets elegance: CASA Armchair Set. With its modern lines, soft textured fabric, and natural wood details, CASA is designed to add a simple yet impressive atmosphere to your living space.
casa.material: The stylish harmony of light gray and brown tones adds both warmth and tranquility to the decor. Its soft seating structure, large cushions, and supportive back design provide maximum comfort even during long sittings. CASA adapts to every style of interior with its balanced blend of classic and modern style.
casa.soft: Soft seating areas offering high comfort
casa.quality: Quality fabric texture and natural wooden legs
casa.salon: Aesthetic and functional contribution to large living rooms
casa.company: CASA Armchair Set is a new favorite for those who want to combine elegance and comfort in their home. Simple elegance, strong character.

golf.title: GOLF
golf.description: The point where elegance meets luxury: GOLF Armchair Set. This set, which reinterprets the classic Chester style with modern lines, brings a sophisticated touch to your living spaces.
golf.material: The fabric structure used in different textures and tones combines with the quilted workmanship on the armrests to offer a rich visuality. Ideal for those seeking both comfort and aesthetics, GOLF also provides ease of cleaning thanks to its high leg design.
golf.chester: Modern quilted arm details in Chester style
golf.velvet: Comfortable seating areas with a velvety texture
golf.wood: Warm and natural look with wooden legs
golf.combination: Unique decorative options with two color combinations
golf.company: GOLF Armchair Set is the choice of those who want to experience both elegance and comfort at the same time. This special design, which will change the atmosphere of your home, makes a difference at first glance.

odessa.title: ODESSA
odessa.description: Modern elegance meets the inspiring colors of nature: ODESSA Armchair Set. Its design with soft lines and the harmony of pastel green and cream tones offers a peaceful living space.
odessa.material: Standing out with its minimalist lines and aesthetic details, ODESSA is an ideal option for those who adopt a simple yet stylish decoration approach. The wooden leg structure combines natural texture with modern furniture design.
odessa.soft: Comfortable seating areas with soft texture
odessa.velvet: Comfortable seating areas with a velvety texture
odessa.pastel: Modern color harmony in pastel tones
odessa.cleaning: High legs that offer easy cleaning
odessa.company: ODESSA Armchair Set is designed to add freshness and naturalness to your home. If you are after simple elegance, this collection is just for you!

piano.title: PIANO
piano.description: Meet the modern interpretation of timeless elegance: PIANO Armchair Set. The striking harmony of deep navy blue and elegant cream tones adds a sophisticated atmosphere to your living spaces.
piano.material: Its design enriched with simple lines, metal leg details, and quality upholstery offers both aesthetics and comfort. With its vertical stitching details and velvet-textured surface, PIANO interprets luxury in a minimal language and is a candidate to be the indispensable piece of modern home decoration.
piano.soft: Wide seating areas offering high comfort
piano.company: PIANO Armchair Set is a perfect choice for those who adopt an elegant yet assertive decoration approach. Bring life to your home with the perfect balance of aesthetics and comfort.

turkuaz.title: TURKUAZ
turkuaz.description: The warmth of nature meets classic elegance: TURKUAZ Armchair Set. The soothing softness of beige tones, brown pillow details, and elegant stitching patterns combine to add simple elegance to your living space.
turkuaz.material: Curved arm structure, retro-inspired wooden legs, and finely crafted back details promise an experience inspired by traditional style but offering modern comfort. With its wide seating area and soft cushions, it provides both aesthetics and ease of use.
turkuaz.company: TURKUAZ Armchair Set is ideal for those seeking a warm, sincere, and timeless decoration style. You can create a peaceful atmosphere in your home with a nostalgic touch.

zen.title: ZEN
zen.descriptionStrong: The warmth of nature meets classic elegance: ZEN Armchair Set.
zen.description: The nobility of gray tones is enriched with quilted details, adding a sophisticated atmosphere to your living room.
zen.material: With its elegant curves, stylish stitching, and comfort-oriented design, ZEN has both traditional touches and a contemporary stance. Its high-legged structure offers easy cleaning, while its rich fabric texture takes comfort to the next level.

zen.company: is a stylish choice for those who want to create elegant living spaces. This set, which brings luxury and tranquility together, will be the star of your home.

features.text: BELLA Bergere, which stands out with its leather-look upholstery, offers a pleasant relaxation experience thanks to its high back support and wide seating area. It provides long-lasting use with its quality material and craftsmanship.

about.title: NEVA FURNITURE
about.intro: Our first memory as Neva Furniture, our first experience of expressing ourselves, our first excitement, is the upholstery fabric and sofa mixed store we opened in 1990.
about.intro2: This small beginning made in the name of experience and expertise has remained as a pleasant memory in minds by giving way to 'NEVA' in the following years.
about.styleText: Style requires mastery. It shows itself in every detail of the design, from the chosen materials to the fabric, from the stitches to the finest lines. Style is bringing trends together with accumulation. Even directing them. Because everyone follows fashion... But what's important is to be followed.
about.styleText2: Style is both keeping up with the world and creating your own world. It's winking at tomorrow while catching today.
about.designText: Expectations, needs, and preferences change... But the power of style doesn't change. Because style attracts attention, influences, and inspires admiration. Style is much more than a beautiful design.
about.designText2: Style cannot be defined with words, but everyone who sees it recognizes it instantly. If you want to see it more closely; the address is our nearest store. Because...
about.designText3: The home fashion that progressed with its unique simplicity in the 90s gave way to modern lines in the following years, and the Turkish furniture industry managed to reach its deserved place in world markets.
about.whyUsText: Our consumers can be informed about our products through our regularly published catalogs and organized fabric cards each year, and benefit from their ideas and experiences.
about.whyUsText2: With a quarter-century of knowledge, experience, and effectiveness in the sector; NEVA works with the general principles of aesthetic perspective, ergonomic use, and new trends, keeping up with every development required by the age.
